Text:
Thank you, for the upload!  

Stossel for President in 2012!

de rien

I think more would improve if there were more Stossel-types in Congress, rather than as president. Although, a president a-la Grover Cleveland for the modern era would be nice.
mmmm...  okay.  we must clone the 'stossel' 436x...
God love ya, John Stossel! The one journalist putting the best interests of the American public ahead of the best interests of the incumbent politicians.
